==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* ''{{w|Pacha}}'' is an {{w|Andean}} cosmological concept and literally means "place" in {{w|Quechua}}. It can also refer to time, with ''Nawpa Pacha'' meaning "ancient times" or "time of the ancestors."
